testsuite.name: Scenario: Testing both a status code and a field

testcase.name: Given a film exists with the Title IT
testcase.classname: Scenario: Testing both a status code and a field

testcase.name: When a user retrieves the film by the title IT
testcase.classname: Scenario: Testing both a status code and a field

testcase.name: Then the status code reads 200
testcase.classname: Scenario: Testing both a status code and a field

testcase.name: And the Rated Field is equal to R
testcase.classname: Scenario: Testing both a status code and a field

testsuite.name: Scenario: Testing the API using parameters

testcase.name: Given a film exists with the Title "Hop"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Testing the API using parameters

testcase.name: When a user retrieves the film by the title "Hop"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Testing the API using parameters

testcase.name: Then the status code reads 200
testcase.classname: Scenario: Testing the API using parameters

testcase.name: And the Rated Field is equal to "PG"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Testing the API using parameters

testsuite.name: Scenario Outline: Testing the API using a table

testcase.name: Given a film exists with the Title "Hop"
When a user retrieves the film by the title "Hop"
Then the status code reads 200
And the Rated Field is equal to "PG"
Given a film exists with the Title "It"
When a user retrieves the film by the title "It"
Then the status code reads 200
And the Rated Field is equal to "R"
Given a film exists with the Title "Up"
When a user retrieves the film by the title "Up"
Then the status code reads 200
And the Rated Field is equal to "PG"
Given a film exists with the Title "Saw"
When a user retrieves the film by the title "Saw"
Then the status code reads 200
And the Rated Field is equal to "R"
